subject: Olympic Games (2008)
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Nikolay Davydenko of Russia said he might skip the Beijing Olympics because the long flight could hurt his performance at the United States Open, which follows the Olympics in August. Sixth-ranked Andy Roddick of the United States is the only top player who has said he will not play in Beijing.
